channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JXR-18] JXR Fails with NPE if the .java file is empty (class commented out)
item.description:
If you build a project and one of your java files exists (but is empty / commented out), JXR generates a NPE

[INFO] Generate "Source Xref" report.
[INFO] Scanning W:\1244 - Knowledge Management System (KMS)\dev\modules\kms-services\src\main\java
Unable to processPath W:\1244 - Knowledge Management System (KMS)\dev\modules\kms-services\src\main\java\com\cswgroup\kms\services\cont
ent\contenthandler\AddCheckOutMetadataHandler.java => W:\1244 - Knowledge Management System (KMS)\dev\modules\kms-services\target/site/
xref\com\cswgroup\kms\services\content\contenthandler\AddCheckOutMetadataHandler.html

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: This project has moved from Jira to GitHub Issues. This issue was migrated to apache/maven-jxr#166.
